content: Frendinos,  Harju 8 has been now open for more than a year almost every day from 11-02 and we feel now its time to give back to our dear Harju 8 Family some well deserved soothing time.ðŸŽ¢  We will pack our stroll on luggages and head out to the woods for few days to celebrate&reminisce the past year so this means we are closed this Sunday - Tuesday 27-29.10. ... We will open up again Wednesday 30th 11-02 (Lunch normally 11-15). See More
